title: Nokia 8.3 5G receives stable Android 12 with April 2022 security patches
content:
The Nokia 8.3 5G was introduced back in September 2020. The phone comes packed with solid internals that make it such a steal when considering its price tag. These include a 64MP main camera, 120Hz refresh rate display, 1080 x 2400 FHD+ display, a headphone jack, and much more. More importantly, though, the phone remains

The post Nokia 8.3 5G receives stable Android 12 with April 2022 security patches appeared first on XDA.
description: The Android 12 update is rolling out to the Nokia 8.3 5G in select regions, bringing Conversation Widgets, new security patches, and more.
